items.content_html: The Currency Converter is a web-based application that allows users to convert amounts between different currencies using real-time exchange rates. The project is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it simple, lightweight, and easy to use.
items.title: VaibhavT-123/Currency-Converter: The Currency Converter is a web-based application that allows users to convert amounts between different currencies using real-time exchange rates. The project is built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it simple, lightweight, and easy to use.

items.content_html: Lightweight version of i18n for react
items.title: David200197/react-i18n-thin: Lightweight version of i18n for react

items.content_html: A Node.js and Express.js-based API for creating short URLs, powered by MongoDB for data storage. This project validates URLs using both syntax checks and DNS lookups to ensure robust functionality. It supports creating, retrieving, and redirecting short URLs, making it a perfect lightweight solution for URL shortening services.
items.title: Harish010818/fcc_URL-Shortener-Microservice: A Node.js and Express.js-based API for creating short URLs, powered by MongoDB for data storage. This project validates URLs using both syntax checks and DNS lookups to ensure robust functionality. It supports creating, retrieving, and redirecting short URLs, making it a perfect lightweight solution for URL shortening services.

items.content_html: This repository contains a simple Count Button Project built using React and Vite, designed to demonstrate fundamental concepts of React, including state management and event handling. It is a lightweight, beginner-friendly project ideal for those looking to understand how React works in a modern development setup with Vite.
items.title: sumit320/count-button: This repository contains a simple Count Button Project built using React and Vite, designed to demonstrate fundamental concepts of React, including state management and event handling. It is a lightweight, beginner-friendly project ideal for those looking to understand how React works in a modern development setup with Vite.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js function that flattens nested JSON objects into a single-level structure with dot-separated keys. Designed for simplicity, flexibility, and deployment as a cloud function, this utility is ideal for transforming complex JSON structures into a more manageable format.
items.title: mwfelton/flatten-json-func: A lightweight Node.js function that flattens nested JSON objects into a single-level structure with dot-separated keys. Designed for simplicity, flexibility, and deployment as a cloud function, this utility is ideal for transforming complex JSON structures into a more manageable format.

Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.
items.title: RyomenDev/google-oauth-kit: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension designed to track and manage time spent on individual browser tabs. Features include real-time tab usage tracking, a user-friendly interface for viewing tab usage data, and customizable notifications to help improve productivity.
